episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch02:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] accompanied
Leon so he wouldn’t get lost.

That was a huge help,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Thanks for guiding me! If there’s anything
I can do for you, just say the word!

(Ask him how to become the
strongest.)
The strongest, huh? Tough question!

(Ask him to tell you about being the
strongest.)
Of course! But first things first...
What does it MEAN to be the strongest?

Is whoever wins most the strongest?
Surely it’s not that simple.
Hmm...

There is one method to becoming stronger
I CAN teach you.

Battle more opponents, and keep gaining
experience!

It’ll broaden your perspective and help you
adapt!

What kind of Pokémon should you use?
Which moves should you choose?

In my experience, Trainers who can make
quick calls like that are tough to beat!
Was my answer too obvious?

If that’s how you feel, you might just
become the strongest yourself,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

That reminds me—when I first met you on
Pasio...

I had this feeling that someday, you’d appear
before me as the strongest challenger.

But what does “strongest” mean?
No one knows!
So let’s figure it out together—you and me!
Just like how we found our way here!

Wait, now that I think about it...
All I did was let you guide me here...

Oh, that reminds me! Want to grab a bite
to eat, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
My treat!
A few days later...

[Name:PlayerNickname ] was challenging
Leon to an official match.
You made it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

That reminds me... You know how we talked
about becoming the strongest?
I have one more thing to share with you.

If you want to be the strongest, you can’t
escape having to battle on a big stage
like this!

When you battle under the gaze of a
crowd...
the pressure and expectations can be heavy.

Even the most skilled Trainers can crack
under it.

That’s another reason to battle as many
people you can!

Can you hear it,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

The roar of the audience can also be a bit
cruel... They want nothing more than to see
one of us lose, after all!

There may be times when even the
supportive voices feel overwhelming.
But...

If you convert that pressure into power,
you can become even stronger!

How about it? Feel the excitement in
every cell?
That nervousness and exhilaration...

Convert it into strength, and give me all
you’ve got!

Come on! We’re gonna have an
absolutely champion time!
